text: Yet another member of the herpes virus family, EBV, affects, in addition to the regulation of apoptosis [66] , the cellular translational machinery. The viral protein LMP2A activates mTOR1, most certainly via the PI3K/Akt signaling pathway since the activation is sensitive to the PI3K inhibitor Wortmannin. This leads to an enhanced disassociation of 4E-BP from eIF4E and thus to an activation of the cap-dependent translation [90] .
